Language.Sentence: The Calendar type produces an object displayed as a calendar. The Calendar object can also send in arguments of the GET request method the selected dates, which can be processed by VDOM server.

Type.SourceCode:
class VDOM_calendar(VDOM_object): def render(self, parent, contents=""): if self.visible == "1": new_styles = "" styles_bodies = "" if self.borderWidth or self.borderColor or self.dateAreaColor or self.width or self.fontSize: new_styles += "table : 'new_table_%s'"%(self.id) styles_bodies += """.new_table_%s{border: %spx solid #%s; font-size: %spx; color: #000; background: #%s; font-family: tahoma,verdana,sans-serif;width:%spx;}"""%(self.id, self.borderWidth, self.borderColor, self.fontSize, self.dateAreaColor, self.width) if self.titleFontColor or self.titleColor: new_styles += ", title : 'new_title_%s'"%(self.id) styles_bodies += """ .new_title_%s{font-weight: bold; text-align: center; background: #%s; color: #%s; padding: 2px;}"""%(self.id, self.titleColor, self.titleFontColor) if self.headColor or self.headFontColor: new_styles += ", headrow : 'new_headrow_%s'"%(self.id) styles_bodies += """ .new_headrow_%s{background: #%s; color: #%s;}"""%(self.id, self.headColor, self.headFontColor) if self.dayNameColor: new_styles += ", daynames : 'new_daynames_%s'"%(self.id) styles_bodies += """ .new_daynames_%s{background: #%s;}"""%(self.id, self.dayNameColor) if self.dayColor: new_styles += ", day : 'new_day_%s'"%(self.id) styles_bodies += """ .new_day_%s{width: 2em;color: #%s;text-align: right;padding: 2px 4px 2px 2px;}"""%(self.id, self.dayColor) if self.tipColor or self.tipFontColor: new_styles += ", ttip : 'new_ttip_%s'"%(self.id) styles_bodies += """ .new_ttip_%s{background: #%s;color: #%s;border-top: 1px solid #556;padding: 1px;}"""%(self.id, self.tipColor, self.tipFontColor) if self.navigationPanelColor: new_styles += ", nav : 'new_nav_%s'"%(self.id) styles_bodies += """ .new_nav_%s{background-color: #%s;}"""%(self.id, self.navigationPanelColor) if self.weekendColor: new_styles += ", weekend : 'new_weekend_%s'"%(self.id) styles_bodies += """ .new_weekend_%s{color: #%s;}"""%(self.id, self.weekendColor) if self.todayColor: new_styles += ", selected : 'new_selected_%s'"%(self.id) styles_bodies += """ .new_selected_%s{font-weight: bold;border: 1px solid #000;padding: 1px 3px 1px 1px;background: #%s;color: #000;}"""%(self.id, self.todayColor) if self.todayFontColor: new_styles += ", today : 'new_today_%s'"%(self.id) styles_bodies += """ .new_today_%s{font-weight: bold; color: #%s;}"""%(self.id, self.todayFontColor) if self.weekColor: new_styles += ", wn : 'new_wn_%s'"%(self.id) styles_bodies += """ .new_wn_%s{padding: 2px 3px 2px 2px; border-right: 1px solid #000; background: #%s;}"""%(self.id, self.weekColor) if self.weekdayColor: new_styles += ", name : 'new_name_%s'"%(self.id) styles_bodies += """ .new_name_%s{border-bottom: 1px solid #000; padding: 2px; text-align: center; color: #%s;}"""%(self.id, self.weekdayColor) styles_bodies += """ .special_%s{background-color: #000000; color: #FFFFFF;}"""%(self.id) zindex = '' if int(self.zindex) == '0' else 'z-index:' + self.zindex; style = "overflow: auto; position: absolute; " + zindex + "; top: " + self.top + "px; left: " + self.left + "px; width: " + self.width + "px;" if str(self.skin) == "0": cur_skin = "/5e390dc2-367f-4eef-b12c-dfbb063bd518.res" else: cur_skin = self.skin id = 'o_' + (self.id).replace('-', '_') if self.containerlink: ref_obj = application.objects.search(self.containerlink) else: ref_obj = application.objects.search(request.container.id) page = "/%s.vdom" % ref_obj.name if ref_obj else "" obj = application.objects.search(self.id) if obj.parent.type.name == "form": redirecting = "" else: redirecting = """if (calendar.dateClicked || calendar.weekClicked) window.location = "%s" + "?year=" + y + "&month=" + m + "&day=" + d + "&weekClicked=" + calendar.weekClicked;"""%(page) result = u"" if not self.css or self.css == "": result += u"""""" % (cur_skin) else: styles_bodies = self.css result += u"""
""" return result def wysiwyg(self, parent, contents=""): import calendar import datetime year = datetime.date.today().year month = datetime.date.today().month today = datetime.date.today().day monthcalendar = calendar.monthcalendar( year, month ) if len( monthcalendar ) < 5: monthcalendar.append( [ 0 for i in range( 0, 7 ) ] ) cellwidth = int(self.width) / 8 result = \ u""" """.format( id = self.id, zindex = self.zindex, width = self.width, top = self.top, left = self.left, fontsize = self.fontSize, cellwidth = cellwidth, dateAreaColor = self.dateAreaColor, titleColor = self.titleColor, titleFontColor = self.titleFontColor, month = calendar.month_name[month], year = year, navigationPanelColor = self.navigationPanelColor, dayNameColor = self.dayNameColor, borderWidth = self.borderWidth, borderColor = self.borderColor, dayColor = self.dayColor, weekColor = self.weekColor, weekdayColor = self.weekdayColor, headFontColor = self.headFontColor, headColor = self.headColor, tipFontColor = self.tipFontColor) for week in monthcalendar: daynumber = week[0] or week[1] or week[2] or week[3] or week[4] or week[5] or week[6] weeknumber = datetime.date( year, month, daynumber ).isocalendar()[1] result += u""" """.format( number = weeknumber, bgcolor = self.weekColor, width = cellwidth) dayCounter=0 for day in week: dayCounter = dayCounter + 1 result += u"" bgcolor = self.dateAreaColor dayFontColor = self.dayColor border = "" if dayCounter == 6 or dayCounter == 7: dayFontColor = self.weekendColor if day == today: dayFontColor = self.todayFontColor bgcolor = self.todayColor border = "border:1 solid black" result += \ u""" """.format( day = day if day != 0 else '', bgcolor = bgcolor, border = border, dayFontColor = dayFontColor, width = cellwidth ) result += u"" result += \ u""" """.format( bgcolor = self.tipColor, width = cellwidth, tipFontColor = self.tipFontColor, today = today ) result += u"
? {month}, {year}
<<> < Today > >>
wk Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun
{number}{day}
Select date

= param["minYear"]["value"] else: min_year = attrs["minYear"].value if "maxYear" in param: max_year = param["maxYear"]["value"] else: max_year = attrs["maxYear"].value if min_year != '' and min_year != '' and int(min_year) > int(max_year): o.set_attributes({"minYear": min_year, "maxYear": min_year}) if "width" in param and param["width"]["value"] != '' and int(param["width"]["value"]) < 158: o.set_attributes({"width": 158}) if "skin" in param: skin = param["skin"]["value"] if str(skin) != "0": o.set_attributes({"borderWidth": "1", "fontSize": "11", "width": "250"}) if skin ==
